name: STAREK Scientific Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of an online shopping platform intended for the purchase and sale of scientific research commodities by researchers. The company's platform offers multiple payment options, cross-device compatibility, price transparency, commodity consulting service and artificial intelligence-backed recommendations for each user's needs, enabling research practitioners to find their desired products with accuracy, speed and convenience and have an innovative research shopping experience.
one_liner: Developer of an online shopping platform intended for the purchase and sale of scientific research commodities by researchers. The company's platform offers multiple payment options, cross-device compatibility, price transparency, commodity consulting service and artificial intelligence-backed recommendations for each user's needs, enabling research practitioners to find their desired products with accuracy, speed and convenience and have an innovative research shopping experience.
